short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows easier management of your mailer accounts and emails.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UltiSend for ViralMailProfits allows you to easily manage and send to all of your viral mailer accounts.  It stores logins and email templates so you can easily access, track, and send.
